resp = client.indices.put_index_template(
    name="new-data-stream-template",
    index_patterns=[
        "new-data-stream*"
    ],
    data_stream={},
    priority=500,
    template={
        "mappings": {
            "properties": {
                "@timestamp": {
                    "type": "date_nanos"
                }
            }
        },
        "settings": {
            "sort.field": [
                "@timestamp"
            ],
            "sort.order": [
                "desc"
            ]
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
